is used to push a value (typically an argument of function call) onto the stack. (-> [[IntermediateLanguage]])

h1. format

<pre><code>["argument", <opecodes_next>]</code></pre>

h1. registers

* reads:
** a: the value to push
** s: old stack size
* writes:
** x: next opecode
** s: new stack size

h1. example

program:
<pre><code>(print "hi")</code></pre>

compiled:
<pre><code>[frame
   [constant "hi"
   [argument
   [constant 1
   [argument
   [refer-global "print"
   [apply]]]]]]
[halt]]</code></pre>

trace:

|_.register|_.before|_.after|
|a|"hi" | "hi"|
|x|["argument", next] | next|
|/2. stack| |"hi" |
|               ...|...|
